original_text:
This is what the Lord says:
“For three sins of Edom,
    even for four, I will not relent.
Because he pursued his brother with a sword
    and slaughtered the women of the land,
because his anger raged continually
    and his fury flamed unchecked,
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 에돔의 서너 가지 죄로 말미암아 내가 그 벌을 돌이키지 아니하리니 이는 그가 칼로 그의 형제를 쫓아가며 긍휼을 버리며 항상 맹렬히 화를 내며 분을 끝없이 품었음이라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
even for four, I will not relent.
Because he pursued his brother with a sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 칼로 자기 형제를 쫓았기 때문이며,

sentences.original_text: and slaughtered the women of the land,
